DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of AGN-229666 for the treatment of seasonal or perennial allergic conjunctivitis.
DOC.brief_title: AGN-229666 Ophthalmic Solution for the Treatment of Seasonal or Perennial Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Japanese patients living in Japan with allergic conjunctivitis with itching and redness Able and willing to discontinue wearing any contact lenses during the study period. Eye surgical intervention and/or a history of refractive surgery within 6 months History of retinal detachment, diabetic retinopathy, or progressive retinal disease Presence of active eye infection (bacterial, viral, or fungal) History of an eye herpetic infection Use of corticosteroids within 6 months or anticipated use during the study.
